title: Liz March Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Liz March? Check out all of Liz March's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogLiz March Digital Research Specialist Liz March Liz March is a Content Marketing Manager and Digital Intelligence expert at Similarweb. With over 15 year’s experience working for global technology firms and blue-chip brands, she enjoys transforming complex topics into meaningful content that inspires, educates, and delivers value. With a healthy obsession for analytics and a flair for storytelling, she is both a creator and strategist. Outside the office, she enjoys the great outdoors, watching F1 or reading a good book. Liz earned her Bachelor’s Degree in English and is currently studying towards a BSc in Environmental Science. Show more Research Intelligence Competitive Matrix Types: Which Is Right For You?
